message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $12,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and features. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  However,  $9,000 is a bit too low for me to consider. Could you meet me at $11,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
